 }} 'Sudler's Conclusion' is a historic home located at
Manokin, Somerset County, Maryland. It is a two part house consisting of a -
story, early-18th-century Flemish bond brick section with a frame two-story west
wing erected about 1840. Also on the property is a log smokehouse, frame tobacco
barn, and a small private cemetery.

It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1973.
categories: Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Maryland
